name: ITS mobility e.V.
goal: ITS mobility has many years of experience with the initiation, application and administrative management of research collaborative projects. We also take over the tasks of administrative offices for industrial consortia and networks.( n)( n)ITS mobility is a broad network which links mobility research and industry in a regional, national and international manner. By joining forces, we have a significant branch knowledge as well as distinct sensitivity for mobility trends. For every innovative idea you will find motivated campaigners; for every question the right contact person. Our events and projects are the ideal platform to promote the direct exchange and knowledge transfer. Moreover, we introduce young talents to smart mobility concepts.
euInitiatives:
European eCall Implementation Platform
C-Roads
Public consultation on specifications for Cooperative Intelligent Transport Systems
